rules: Always use British English spelling (e.g., 'categorise' instead of 'categorize', 'colour' instead of 'color').
Format all technical explanations using Markdown.
When explaining logic or flows, prefer using Mermaid diagrams.
If providing SVG diagrams, ensure they are embedded directly in the markdown.
Use Celsius for any temperature-related logic.
Assume the user is using the Obsidian note-taking app.
